disable_incognito_check.title: Disable Incognito Permission Check
disable_incognito_check.description: When set to true, the incognito mode access check will be disabled, useful when incognito mode is disabled by G Suite policy

zone_username.title: Zone Username
zone_username.description: Specifies the zone admin username to use for automatic device assignment

zone_password.title: Zone Password
zone_password.description: Specifies the zone admin password to use for automatic device assignment

zone_user_id.title: Zone User ID
zone_user_id.description: Specifies the zone user ID to use assign the device to during automatic device assignment

zone_id.title: Zone ID
zone_id.description: Specifies the ID of the zone the user resides in
